name: elvjs
description: Elvis has left the building - Event Emitter

scripts.build-lib: npm run clean-build && tsc && npm run browserify && npm run minify
scripts.test: npm run build-tests && npm run tests
scripts.browserify: browserify build/index.js > lib/index.js && npm run browserify-post
scripts.copy: cp src/*.ts lib && cp build/*.d.ts lib
scripts.browserify-post: npm run copy && npm run clean-build
